title: Image Carousel in Posts
description: Implement multi-image posts with a PageView carousel, dots indicator, and pinch-to-zoom functionality for a polished image viewing experience.
instructions:
Implement an image carousel for posts:

1. Replace grid layout with PageView for 2+ images
2. Add dots indicator showing current position
3. Implement smooth page transitions
4. Add pinch-to-zoom on individual images
5. Support swipe gestures for navigation
6. Show image counter (1/4, 2/4, etc.)
7. Preload adjacent images for smooth scrolling

hints.text: Use PageView.builder with physics: const BouncingScrollPhysics() for smooth scrolling
Preload images using CachedNetworkImage's precacheImage or a FutureBuilder that loads adjacent images
For pinch-to-zoom, wrap each image in InteractiveViewer or use the photo_view package for more features

commonMistakes.consequence: Carousel takes full screen or has layout overflow issues
commonMistakes.correction: Use SizedBox or ConstrainedBox with specific height, and set PageView's viewportFraction if needed

commonMistakes.mistake: Dots indicator not visible on light images
commonMistakes.consequence: Users cannot see which image they are on
commonMistakes.correction: Add a semi-transparent dark gradient overlay at the bottom, or use outlined dots with shadows
